name: Coalesce (I Aᴍ Aᴀʀᴏɴ)
description:
Rate my game: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021/rate/1080831

This is a simple puzzle game I made in 2 days for the GMTK game jam 2021.  This is also the first game that I actually finished & published. I know it is way to easy for a puzzle game, but due to the GMTK time limit I didn't have enough time to add bigger levels, I might update it after GMTK game jam to include more mechanics & levels.

Controls - WASD or arrow keys to move.

Music composed by AIVA - Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist

All Sprites created by me during the 2 days using Aseprite

In-game font Peepo by André Felipe

Game engine used Unity
